name: qsv-flatten
description: A flattened view of CSV records. Useful for viewing one record at a time. e.g. `qsv slice -i 5 data.csv | qsv flatten`.

options.description: Limits the length of each field to the value specified. If the field is UTF-8 encoded, then <arg> refers to the number of code points. Otherwise, it refers to the number of bytes.
The field delimiter for reading CSV data. Must be a single character. (default: ,)
A string of character to write between a column name and its value.
When set, the first row will not be interpreted as headers. When set, the name of each field will be its index.
A string of characters to write after each record. When non-empty, a new line is automatically appended to the separator. [default: #]
